name: Anti-Clock Adventure
description:
This game was made with the intention to use AI for pretty much anything. The following AIs were used:

ChatGPT: Basic idea, naming of the game, some lines of code

Midjourney/StableDiffusion: Any art that is shown ingame

Aiva: Any music that can be heard ingame

ChatGPT says the following to our game: "Anti-Clock Adventure" is an electrifying beat-based jump and run game set in a stunning steampunk world. With a clock-based movement system, players must time their jumps and movements to the rhythm of the music to progress through challenging levels filled with obstacles, traps, and hazards. With stunning graphics, a thumping soundtrack, and non-stop action, "Anti-Clock Adventure" is the ultimate test of your timing skills and reflexes. Are you ready to conquer the clock and become a clockwork champion
